   19: %%
   20: -module(dialyzer_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   26: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(10)).
   27: -define(application, dialyzer).
   28: 
   29: %% Test server specific exports
   30: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   31: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   32: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases must be exported.
   35: -export([app_test/1, appup_test/1]).
   36: -export([cplt_info/1, iplt_info/1,
   37:          incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode/1,
   38:          classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode/1,
   39:          if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it/1,
   40:          file_list/1,
   41:          line_coverage/1]).
   42: 
   43: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   44: 
   45: all() ->
   46:     [app_test, appup_test, cplt_info, iplt_info,
   47:      incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode,
   48:      classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode,
   49:      if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it,
   50:      file_list,
   51:      line_coverage].
   52: 
   53: groups() ->
   54:     [].
   55: 
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   60:     ok.
   61: 
   62: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: 
   69: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   70:     Dog=test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   71:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   72: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   73:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   74:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   75:     ok.
   76: 
   77: compile(Config, Prog, Module, CompileOpts) ->
   78:     Source = lists:concat([Module, ".erl"]),
   79:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
   80:     Filename = filename:join([PrivDir, Source]),
   81:     ok = file:write_file(Filename, Prog),
   82:     Opts = [report, {outdir, PrivDir}, debug_info | CompileOpts],
   83:     {ok, Module} = compile:file(Filename, Opts),
   84:     {ok, filename:join([PrivDir, lists:concat([Module, ".beam"])])}.
   85: 
   86: %%%
   87: %%% Test cases starts here.
   88: %%%
   89: 
   90: app_test(doc) ->
   91:     ["Test that the .app file does not contain any `basic' errors"];
   92: app_test(suite) ->
   93:     [];
   94: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     test_server:app_test(dialyzer).
   96: 
   97: %% Test that the .appup file does not contain any `basic' errors
   98: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     ok = test_server:appup_test(dialyzer).
  100: 
  101: cplt_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  103:     Prog1 =
  104:       <<"-module(foo).
  105: 
  106:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  107:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  108: 
  109:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "cplt_info.plt"),
  110:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  111:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  112:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  113:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  114: 
  115:     {ok, [{files, [Beam1]}]} = dialyzer:plt_info(Plt1).
  116: 
  117: iplt_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  119:     Prog1 =
  120:       <<"-module(foo).
  121: 
  122:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  123:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  124: 
  125:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "iplt_info.plt"),
  126:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  127:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  128:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  129:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  130: 
  131:     {ok, {incremental, [{modules, [foo]}]}} = dialyzer:plt_info(Plt1).
  132: 
  133: incremental_plt_given_to_classic_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  135:     Prog1 =
  136:       <<"-module(foo).
  137: 
  138:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  139:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  140: 
  141:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "my_incremental.iplt"),
  142:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  143:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  144:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  145:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  146:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  147: 
  148:     ?assertException(throw, {dialyzer_error, "Given file is an incremental PLT file, but outside of incremental mode, a classic PLT file is expected: {init_plt_file," ++ _ },
  149:                  dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_check},
  150:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  151:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  152:                        {from, byte_code}])).
  153: 
  154: classic_plt_given_to_incremental_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  156:     Prog1 =
  157:       <<"-module(foo).
  158: 
  159:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  160:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  161: 
  162:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "my_classic.plt"),
  163:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  164:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  165:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  166:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  167:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  168: 
  169:     ?assertException(throw, {dialyzer_error, "Given file is a classic PLT file, but in incremental mode, an incremental PLT file is expected: {init_plt_file," ++ _ },
  170:                  dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  171:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  172:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  173:                        {from, byte_code}])).
  174: 
  175: if_output_plt_is_missing_incremental_mode_makes_it(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  177:     Prog1 =
  178:       <<"-module(foo).
  179: 
  180:          bar() -> ok.">>,
  181:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog1, foo, []),
  182: 
  183:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "brand_new.iplt"),
  184:     ?assertMatch(false, filelib:is_regular(Plt1)),
  185: 
  186:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, incremental},
  187:                        {files, [Beam1]},
  188:                        {init_plt, Plt1},
  189:                        {output_plt, Plt1},
  190:                        {from, byte_code}]),
  191: 
  192:     ?assertMatch(true, filelib:is_regular(Plt1)).
  193: 
  194: file_list(Config) ->
  195:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  196: 
  197:     case dialyzer_common:check_plt(PrivDir) of
  198:         fail -> ct:fail("Plt creation/check failed");
  199:         ok -> ok
  200:     end,
  201: 
  202:     Files = generate_modules(PrivDir, 26),
  203:     ListFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "list_of_files"),
  204:     ok = file:write_file(ListFile, [lists:join("\n", Files), "\n"]),
  205: 
  206:     Expected = expected(Files),
  207:     ExpectedFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "expected"),
  208:     ok = file:write_file(ExpectedFile, Expected),
  209: 
  210:     Plt = dialyzer_common:plt_file(PrivDir),
  211:     Result = os:cmd("dialyzer --plt " ++ Plt ++ " -q --src --input_list_file " ++ ListFile),
  212:     ResultFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "result"),
  213:     ok = file:write_file(ResultFile, Result),
  214: 
  215:     case file_utils:diff(ResultFile, ExpectedFile) of
  216:         same ->
  217:             ok;
  218:         Diff ->
  219:             io:format("~p\n", [Diff]),
  220:             ct:fail(unexpected_result)
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: generate_modules(_Dir, 0) ->
  224:     [];
  225: generate_modules(Dir, N) ->
  226:     Name = "module_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  227:     File = filename:join(Dir, Name ++ ".erl"),
  228:     Code = <<"-module(",(list_to_binary(Name))/binary,").\n",
  229:              "-export([main/1]).\n",
  230:              "main(L) ->\n",
  231:              "  case list_to_atom(L) of\n",
  232:              "    Atom when is_atom(Atom) -> {ok,Atom};\n",
  233:              "    _ -> error\n",
  234:              "  end.\n"
  235:            >>,
  236:     ok = file:write_file(File, Code),
  237:     [File|generate_modules(Dir, N - 1)].
  238: 
  239: expected(Files0) ->
  240:     Files = lists:sort(Files0),
  241:     S = "\n" ++
  242:         [filename:basename(F) ++
  243:              ":6:5: The variable _ can never match since previous clauses completely covered the type \n"
  244:          "          atom()\n" || F <- Files],
  245:     iolist_to_binary(S).
  246: 
  247: line_coverage(Config) ->
  248:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  249:     Prog = <<"-module(foo).
  250:               bar() -> ok."
  251:            >>,
  252:     {ok, Beam1} = compile(Config, Prog, foo, [line_coverage]),
  253: 
  254:     Plt1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "line_coverage.plt"),
  255:     _ = dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, plt_build},
  256:                       {files, [Beam1]},
  257:                       {init_plt, Plt1},
  258:                       {from, byte_code}]),
  259: 
  260:     {ok, [{files, [Beam1]}]} = dialyzer:plt_info(Plt1),
  261: 
  262:     ok.
  263:
